  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createTimer()
    Create timer that call the act with time in nanoseconds Change the score based on the points obtained When the game ends (winning condition reached), stop the timer and prompt alert message with high score list If "space" key is entered, back to start screen
    Animal getAnimal()
    Get the Animal object
    void reset()
    Reset the Animal property, End property, Digit property and points obtained
    void setNumber​(int n)
    Set the Digit to display according to the points obtained Clear the existing Digit before adding new one
    void start()
    Play the music Create the timer Start the timer Reset existing Animal, End, Digit and points obtained
    void stop()
    Stop the timer
